libfacerec documentation¶

libfacerec is a face recognition library for the OpenCV2 C++ API. It provides implementations of the Eigenfaces [TP91], Fisherfaces [Belhumeur97] and Local Binary Patterns Histograms [Ahonen04].

This document describes the API and comes with an extensive tutorial page.

  • Tutorials
  • Eigenfaces
  • Fisherfaces
  • Local Binary Patterns Histograms
  • Literature
